meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Disastrous</kanji> <kanji>condition</kanji>s in the weather lead to you seeing a <vocabulary>disastrous scene</vocabulary>. Just don't look outside and you won't see the horrible stuff out your window right now.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
